notifications.invalidServer_text: Naslov strežnika, ki ste ga vnesli, ni pravilen
notifications.unknownError_text: Željenega dejanja trenutno ni možno izvesti. Prosimo poskusite kasneje.

welcome1.title: Dobrodošel
welcome1.text1: Zahvaljujemo se vam za prenos IOTA denarnice.
welcome1.text2: Naslednjih nekaj minut bomo porabili za nastavitve vaše denarnice.
welcome1.reminder: Mogoče vas bo zamikalo, da preskočite nekaj korakov, vendar vas pozivamo, da dokončaste proces.

welcome2.title: Nastavitve denarnice
welcome2.text2: Ali že imate seed, ki bi ga želeli uporabiti?
welcome2.seed_explanation1: Seed je kot glavno geslo za vaš račun.
welcome2.seed_explanation2: Uporabite ga lahko za dostop do vaših sredstev iz katere koli denarnice, na kateri koli napravi. V primeru da seed izgubiste, prav tako izgubiste vaša sredstva
welcome2.reminder: Prosimo vas, da imate seed shranjen na varnem

lightserver.title: Nastavitve "Light" srežnika
lightserver.text1: A light server is a gateway to the IOTA network, kindly provided by members of the community or our corporate partners.
lightserver.text2: You can find out more information about the servers at: http://iotasupport.com/lightwallet.shtml
lightserver.text3: Please choose a server from the list below.

login.title: Prijava
login.error_text: Geslo ni bilo prepoznano. Prosimo, poskusite ponovno.

enterSeed.title: Vnesite vašo seme
enterSeed.error_text: Seed mora imeti vsaj 60 znakov. Prosimo, poskusite ponovno.
enterSeed.invalid_seed_text: Vaš seed je nepravilen. Seed mora vsebovati velike črke (A-Z) in številko 9, ter mora imeti med 60-81 znakov.
enterSeed.seed_explanation: Seme mora biti dolgo 81 znakov in mora vsebovati velike črke od A do Z ali številko 9. Uporaba semena daljšega od 81 znakov ni mogoča.
enterSeed.reminder: NEVER SHARE YOUR SEED WITH ANYONE

newSeedSetup.title: Napravi nov seed
newSeedSetup.text1: Press individual letters to randomise them.

saveYourSeed.title: Shrani svoj seed
saveYourSeed.text1: Seed morate shraniti z vsaj eno izmed spodnjih možnosti.

saveYourSeed2.title: Shrani svoj seed
saveYourSeed2.explanation: Your seed is 81 characters read from left to right. Write down your seed and checksum and triple check they are correct.

saveYourSeed3.title: Shrani svoj seed
saveYourSeed3.explanation: Kliknite na spodnji gumb za kopiranje seeda v password manager. Seed bo ostal v clipbordu še 60 sekund.
saveYourSeed3.text: Ne shranjujte seeda v navadnem tekstu.

saveYourSeed4.title: Shrani svoje seme
saveYourSeed4.explanation: Kliknite na spodnji gumb za printanje semena v papirnati obliki.

securityIntro.title: SET UP LOCAL PASSPHRASE
securityIntro.text1: To make it easier to log into this wallet, you can now set up a shorter passphrase. This local passphrase can only be used on this device.
securityIntro.explanation1: The local passphrase can only be used to unlock the account on this device.
securityIntro.explanation2: The IOTA seed can still be used to access your funds on any wallet on any device.

setPassword.title: Nastavitve gesla
setPassword.explanation: An encrypted copy of your seed will be stored in your keychain. You will then only need to type in your password to access your wallet.
setPassword.error1_text: Your password must be at least 8 characters. Please try again.
setPassword.error2_text: Vnešeni gesli se ne ujemata. Prosimo, poskusite ponovno.
